cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.16.0 FATAL_ERROR)
project(EVALAUTOR LANGUAGES C)

	Flip_SL.c
	PrintParameters.c
	BestKOptMove.c
	WriteTour.c
	SolveDelaunaySubproblems.c
	SolveSubproblem.c
	Best3OptMove.c
    CreateNNCandidateSet.c
	FixedOrCommonCandidates.c
	SolveCompressedSubproblem.c
	RecordBestTour.c
	Make5OptMove.c
	Connect.c
	Make4OptMove.c
	SolveKCenterSubproblems.c
	IsPossibleCandidate.c
	MergeWithTourIPT.c
	MakeKOptMove.c
	C.c
	eprintf.c
	ERXT.c
	ReadPenalties.c
	SolveKarpSubproblems.c
	Minimum1TreeCost.c
	printff.c
	AddExtraCandidates.c
	RestoreTour.c
	CreateDelaunayCandidateSet.c
	BridgeGain.c
	RemoveFirstActive.c
	IsBackboneCandidate.c
	TrimCandidateSet.c
	fscanint.c
	OrderCandidateSet.c
	MergeTourWithBestTour.c
	Activate.c
	SFCTour.c
	IsCandidate.c
	gpx.c
	ResetCandidateSet.c
	ReadCandidates.c
	WriteCandidates.c
	ReadLine.c
	GetTime.c
	NormalizeSegmentList.c
	Distance.c
	Heap.c
	Forbidden.c
	AdjustClusters.c
	SegmentSize.c
	Between.c
	CreateCandidateSet.c
	Between_SSL.c
	SolveSFCSubproblems.c
	Distance_SPECIAL.c
	GeoConversion.c
	SolveTourSegmentSubproblems.c
	Exclude.c
	Statistics.c
	Sequence.c
	Create_POPMUSIC_CandidateSet.c
	SymmetrizeCandidateSet.c
	Best5OptMove.c
	GenerateCandidates.c

	StoreTour.c
	Make3OptMove.c

	SolveKMeansSubproblems.c
